meanings.sent1: The shirt was fittable for the man.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle pieces were fittable together easily.
meanings.sent3: The shoes were fittable, but the socks were too small!
meanings.sent4: Her idea was fittable into the existing plan seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The key was fittable into the lock with a satisfying click.

meanings.sent1: The fabric was fittable for the dress design.
meanings.sent2: The toolbox was fittable for the job at hand.
meanings.sent3: The hat was fittable for the occasion, but the shoes were not.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were fittable for the new role she was offered.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients were fittable for the recipe, except for the missing spice.

meanings.definition: Capable of being adjusted to fit.
meanings.sent1: The belt was fittable to accommodate different waist sizes.
meanings.sent2: The straps on the backpack were fittable for comfort.
meanings.sent3: The plan was fittable to include more participants.
meanings.sent4: Her schedule was fittable to allow for extra study time.
meanings.sent5: The design was fittable to suit various preferences.
